Articles.Content:
Everytime i time warp to the outer planets, or want to go to get out of the solar system it's 10 boring minutes of my life time warping that i'll never get back again.

This seems like it would be easy enough to implement, that the benefit would far outweigh the effort. 

ESPECIALLY if there are any plans to add other star systems.

Cheerio!

Already suggested. And it would result in some, er.... problems...

And there aren't any plans for more star systems in the near future.

Just set a timer and do something else while your ship warps. With 1.0 you get timewarp-to as well, so jsut tell it to do that and then it'll go to real time. Meaning if you're a bit late you'll be fine.
Sorry, fellas. This is on the list of [things not to suggest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) again because they've already been talked to death.
